directions.step:
From: Wendy Lockman <wlockman@ra1.randomc.com>
Date: Sun, 24 Mar 1996 01:04:42 -0500 Scrub the potatoes and cut them lengthwise into thick slices, then cut the slices into thick strips. Brush the strips with the salad dressing. Place on a greased 15 1/2 X 10 1/2-inch jelly roll pan and season to taste with the onion salt and pepper. Bake in a preheated 375 Degree F for 50 minutes or until tender and golden brown.
NOTE: The recipe can be doubled for an entertaining snack or to serve with hamburgers or bratwurst.
